short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes Facebook Like and Unlike buttons to more truthful alternatives

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Passive-agressive Like buttons. Changes Facebook Like and Unlike buttons to more truthful alternatives such as "I'll allow it" and "I validate your existence".

https://github.com/mdanka/chrome-like-alter
